items.content_html: The best way to publish your scientific knowledge. Source code for the entire OurBigBook Project: OurBigBook.com, ourbigbook CLI and the VS Code extension. A powerful static wiki generator and lightweight markup language to write complex structured wikis/books/blogs with multi-user mind-melding magic 🧙

items.content_html: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.
items.title: Jimmyh-world/Cardano-explorer: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

items.content_html: A lightweight in-memory database written in TypeScript.
items.title: sar4th/AetherCache: A lightweight in-memory database written in TypeScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
items.title: R0LEX7/RolexDB: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
